description.0: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

0.0: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by <cryo>6%</cryo> for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.
